X.i.5.B.3.g
.
Records Available From U.S. Army Transportation Corps or Naval Transportation Service
Logbooks are not available for merchant mariners who were employed by the U.S. Army Transportation Corps or the Naval Transportation Service.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B - Obtaining Merchant Marine Service Records
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B
